## Counterfactual Potency at WFU

```{R Adding Data}
library(haven)
CounterFactual_Mass_Testing <- read_sav("~/Documents/GitHub/Project-1/CounterFactual- Mass Testing.sav")
View(CounterFactual_Mass_Testing)
```

```{R Grouping-by-Gender}
#1= male, 2= female

CFMT_G <- CounterFactual_Mass_Testing %>%
  filter(!is.na(Gender), Gender!="5")

CFMT_G %>%
  group_by(Gender) %>% summarise(Gender = n())

#Labeling Gender
CFMT_G <- CFMT_G %>%
  # Rename 1 to Male, 2 to Female
  mutate(Gender = recode(Gender, "1" = "Male", "2" = "Female"))


CFMT_G %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=CoTh3Number))+
  geom_bar()+ facet_wrap(~Gender)+ labs (x= "Number of Counterfactuals", y= "Number of People") 
```

```{R p-n counterfactuals}

CFMT_G %>%
  ggplot (aes(x=Gender))+
  geom_bar()+ facet_wrap(~CoTh4UP)+ labs (x= "Gender", y= "Number of People") 

```
```{R age}

#Labeling Counterfactuals
CFMT_G <- CFMT_G %>%
  # Rename 1 to Upward, 2 to Downward
  mutate(CoTh4UP = recode(CoTh4UP, "1" = "Upward", "0" = "Downward"))
CFMT_G %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Age))+
  geom_bar()+ facet_wrap(~CoTh4UP)+ labs (x= "Age", y= "Number of People") 
```
